content.question: Which of the following would indicate that economic growth has occurred?

choices.label: The production possibilities curve shifts to the left.
The long-run aggregate supply curve shifts to the right.
The aggregate demand curve shifts to the right.

content.answer: The long-run aggregate supply curve shifts to the right.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
